event: Pastoral nomadic cultures dominate the eastern Eurasian steppe
Turkic Khaganate controls much of the Mongolian Plateau
Khitan Liao dynasty rules Mongolia and northern China
Temujin proclaimed Genghis Khan and unites Mongol tribes
Mongols capture Zhongdu, accelerating continental conquest
Yuan dynasty proclaimed with rule over China
Mongol Empire fragments into rival khanates
Mongols expelled from China by the Ming dynasty
Inner Mongolia incorporated into the Qing Empire
Outer Mongolia submits to Qing protection
Mongolia declares independence after Qing collapse
